body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.5"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1566119499"/> <code code="67659-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS billing Narrative NEMSIS"/> <title>EMS Billing Section</title> <text/> <entry> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.91"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="313105485"/> <code code="67556-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS condition code NEMSIS (Billing condition)"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.92"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1049426456"/> <code code="69464-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Centers for medicare - medicaid, CMS, service level NEMSIS"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entry> </section>
